summary: A law that went into effect Oct. 1, 2022, makes it illegal for someone acting in their capacity as a federal law enforcement officer to engage in a sexual act with someone who is under arrest or supervision, in detention, or in federal custody. Consent is not a defense to a violation. We reported that there were no charges or convictions under this provision in...
title: Federal Law Enforcement: Status Update with Regard to Criminal Sexual Acts while Serving in Official Capacity (Fiscal Year 2025)
